name: DispatchSourceFileSystemObject
desc: A dispatch source that monitors events associated with a file descriptor.

items.name: var handle: Int32
items.desc: The file descriptor of the file or socket.

items.name: var data: DispatchSource.FileSystemEvent
items.desc: The type of the last file system event.

items.name: var mask: DispatchSource.FileSystemEvent
items.desc: The file descriptor attributes being monitored by the dispatch source.
